Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE PROCEDURE GetActivitiesNumbers_select_wbs(@wbsId char(32)) as begin SELECT id1, prev_item, wbs_idx FROM (SELECT wbs.id id1, wbs.prev_item, sub.id id2, wbs.wbs_index wbs_idx FROM sub_wbs sub LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, prev_item, wbs_index FROM wbs_element WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM wbs_activity2 WHERE source_id=wbs_element.id) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM sub_wbs WHERE source_id=wbs_element.id)) wbs ON (wbs.id=sub.related_id) WHERE sub.source_id = @wbsId) res WHERE id1 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY CAST(REPLACE(wbs_idx, '.', '') AS INT) end
Item.name: GetActivitiesNumbers_select_wbs
